resources.string: Welcome to call customer service centre, phone number %1$s, thank you.
Welcome to call customer service centre, thank you.

Dear InFocus users, because the battery inside the mobile phone is consumable, if you find the battery life has decreased significantly when using your phone, please send the phone to a retail agent for testing and maintenance to ensure that your mobile phone continues to operate in the best condition if you find battery life has decreased significantly in the use of the mobile phone. If there is any problem, you are welcome to call our customer service centre, and the phone number is %1$s. Thank you.

Dear InFocus users, because the battery inside the mobile phone is a consumable, please send the mobile phone to the agent for testing and maintenance to ensure that the operating performance of your mobile phone can be maintained in the best condition if you find battery life has decreased significantly in the use of the mobile phone. If there is any problem, you are welcome to call customer service centre. Thank you.

Dear InFocus users, because the battery inside the device is a consumable, please send the device to the agent for testing and maintenance to ensure that the operating performance of your device can be maintained in the best condition if you find its battery life has decreased significantly in the use of the device. If there is any problem, welcome to call customer service centre. Thank you.

Dear InFocus users, because the battery inside the device is a consumable, please send the device to the agent for testing and maintenance to ensure that the operating performance of your device can be maintained in the best condition if you find its battery life has decreased significantly in the use of the device. If there is any problem, welcome to call customer service centre, phone number %1$s, thank you.
Please make sure that the battery is properly installed, otherwise it will not be charged
Make sure that the battery is properly installed
The battery temperature cannot be detected. Please make sure that the battery is properly installed, otherwise it will not be charged.
The battery temperature cannot be detected.
Battery temperature has exceeded the specified range
Because phone temperature is relatively high, turn down the brightness to protect the battery?
At present, the phone is in heat-dissipating mode and you can only make emergency calls.
At present, the device is in heat-dissipating mode, and please use later

"Your phone is getting hot, so it's taking steps to cool itself down. You can still use it, but you may notice: ·Charging might pause. ·Wi-Fi might turn off. ·Applications might close. ·Airplane mode might turn on. Your phone will return to normal once it cools down."
At present, the device is in heat-dissipating mode and you can only make emergency calls.
Currently, the battery temperature cannot be detected, and the phone is in heat-dissipating mode. Only make emergency calls. Make sure the battery is properly installed.
Currently, the battery temperature cannot be detected, and the device is in heat-dissipating mode. Only make emergency calls. Make sure the battery is properly installed.
The maximum charging limit has been reached due to high temperatures! When the phone temperature returns to normal, the system will continue to charge at normal speed.
The device is at a high temperature, so it will not be charged.
Please use the original battery to charge, or you could cause permanent/physical damage to your device.
The maximum charging limit has been reached due to low temperatures! When the phone temperature returns to normal, the system will continue to charge at normal speed.
The phone is at a low temperature, so it will not be charged.
The device is at a low temperature, so it will not be charged.
The watch is at a low temperature and charging will be stopped.
The phone is at a high temperature and shutdown will be performed
The device is at a high temperature and shutdown will be performed
The watch has reached the high temperature limit, about to shut down!
The maximum warning temperature has been reached
The maximum warning temperature has been reached
The phone has resumed normal operation.
The phone has resumed normal operation.
Battery temperature has exceeded the specified range
Please turn off the call or application to facilitate phone cooling.
We offer to lower the screen brightness and turn off the application to cool the device.
Watch temperature is too high! We recommend dimming the screen and turning off the application. Are you sure you want to perform it?
